VerticalContentItem.Subject: <%if (ExternalReferenceId != "") {%>[<%=ExternalReferenceId%>] <%}%>Application for <%=JobTitle %><%if (ExternalReferenceId != "") {%> (ref# <%=ExternalReferenceId%>)<%}%>

ViewContentItem.ViewPartContentItem:
<% if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(To.FirstName)) { %> Hi, <% } else { %> Hi <%= To.FirstName %>, <% } %>

We wanted to let you know that <%= From.FullName %> has applied for the <%=JobTitle %> job <%if (ExternalReferenceId != "") {%> (ref# <%=ExternalReferenceId%>)<%}%> on ">LinkMe.com.au. You can also see their online resume ">here.

<% if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(Content)) { %>

No cover letter was attached.

<% } else { %>

<%= From.FirstName %> attached a cover letter:

<%=Content%>

<% } %>

VerticalContentItem.Subject: LinkMe login details for <%=To.FullName%>

ViewContentItem.ViewPartContentItem:
Dear <%=To.FirstName%>,

Welcome to LinkMe, Australia's leading online career network, with <%=Candidates%> candidates and growing!

Your login ID: <%=LoginId%>
<%if (Password != "") {%> Your password: <%=Password%>

<%} else {%>

<%}%>

"> Log in now to change your password.

Key LinkMe functions:

  • Email alerts - keep up to date with the freshest candidates

  • Advanced search - refine your search for more relevant candidates

  • Keyword search - find candidates with transferable skills for your hard to fill roles

  • Find passive candidates - candidates you might not otherwise have access to

If you would like more information, visit our ">resources section.

Dear <%=To.FirstName%>,
Welcome to LinkMe, Australia's leading online career network, with <%=Candidates%> candidates and growing!
Your login ID: <%=LoginId%> <%if (Password != "") {%> Your password: <%=Password%> <%}%>
Log in now to change your password using this link: <%=TinyUrls.RegisterLogin("~/employers/login", "~/accounts/changepassword")%>
KEY LINKME FUNCTIONS:
* Email alerts - keep up to date with the freshest candidates
* Advanced search - refine your search for more relevant candidates
* Keyword search - find candidates with transferable skills for your hard to fill roles
* Find passive candidates - candidates you might not otherwise have access to
If you would like more information, visit our resources section <%=TinyUrls.Register(false, "~/employers/resources")%>

VerticalContentItem.Subject: Copy: <%=Subject%>

ViewContentItem.ViewPartContentItem:
Please find a copy of the email you sent to <%=MemberDisplayName%> on the <%=Date%>. If you would like to see their resume please
">click here

-------- Original Message --------
<%= DoNotEncode(Content) %>

LinkMe has found <%=TotalCandidates%> suggested candidates for the position<%if (TotalJobs > 1) {%>s<%}%> posted on "><%=GetUrl(false, "~/")%>. These are not applicants, but suggested candidates from our database sent to you as the contact person for <%if (TotalJobs > 1 ) {%>these job ads<%} else {%>this job ad<%}%>.

ViewContentItem.ViewPartContentItem:
Please find attached the resume of <%=MemberName%> as requested.

">View this resume

">Search for more candidates

ViewContentItem.ViewPartContentItem:
Please find attached the resumes as requested.

VerticalContentItem.Subject: You have unused LinkMe applicant credits

ViewContentItem.ViewPartContentItem:
Hi <%= To.FirstName %>

Thank you for using LinkMe for your job ad posting – our records show that you have <%= Quantity %> applicant credits left in your account that are due to expire in one month.

To use the remaining applicant credits, or to purchase further credits, please ">log in to LinkMe to post your current vacancies as job ads on the LinkMe job board.

To discuss further purchase options, please contact me on 1800 LINK ME at your earliest convenience.

We look forward to seeing you on our site again soon.

VerticalContentItem.Subject: You have unused LinkMe contact credits

ViewContentItem.ViewPartContentItem:
Hi <%= To.FirstName %>

Thank you for using LinkMe for your candidate sourcing - our records show that you have <%= Quantity %> contact credits left in your account that are due to expire in one month.

To use the remaining contact credits, or to purchase further credits, please ">log in to LinkMe to search for and contact candidates that are available for your current opportunities.

To discuss further purchase options, please contact me on 1800 LINK ME at your earliest convenience.

We look forward to seeing you on our site again soon.

VerticalContentItem.Subject: You have unused LinkMe job ad credits

ViewContentItem.ViewPartContentItem:
Hi <%= To.FirstName %>

Thank you for using LinkMe for your job ad posting – our records show that you have <%= Quantity %> job ad credits left in your account that are due to expire in one month.

To use the remaining job ad credits, please ">log in to LinkMe to post your advertisements for your current employment opportunities.

To discuss further purchase options, please contact me on 1800 LINK ME at your earliest convenience.

We look forward to seeing you on our site again soon.

VerticalContentItem.Subject: Your unlimited LinkMe account will expire in one month

ViewContentItem.ViewPartContentItem:
Hi <%= To.FirstName %>

Thank you for using LinkMe for your candidate sourcing - our records show that your unlimited access to LinkMe is due to expire in 1 month.

To continue uninterrupted access to the LinkMe database for your candidate sourcing and management, please contact me on 1800 LINK ME or alternatively email me at <%=AccountManager.EmailAddress.Address %> to discuss continuing your subscription, if you have not done so already.

I look forward to speaking with you about continuing your LinkMe access.

VerticalContentItem.Subject: <%=NewCandidates%> fresh candidates

ViewContentItem.ViewPartContentItem:
Hi <%=To.FirstName%>

<%=NewCandidates%> candidates have uploaded or updated their resume since you last visited our web site.

Make your life easier by having the freshest and hard-to-find candidates delivered direct to your inbox - ">set up candidate alerts now. View our handy ">tips to get more out of your subscription.

Take the hassle out of candidate sourcing.

VerticalContentItem.Subject: Thank you for registering your interest with <%=Community.Name%>

ViewContentItem.ViewPartContentItem:
Hi <%=Enquiry.FirstName%>

Thank you for registering your interest in becoming a Preferred Employment Partner through the Monash Business and Economics career and networking portal.

You will be contacted shortly to organise your access to search, review and contact <%=Community.Name%> students and graduates for employment opportunities.

We look forward to working with you.

VerticalContentItem.Subject: LinkMe usage report for <%= orgName %> for <%= reportPeriod %>

ViewContentItem.ViewPartContentItem:
Hi <%= toName %>

Please find attached the activity report for <%= orgName %> for <%= reportPeriod %>. This report details your account activity, including a breakdown of the individual activity for each of your organisation's logins.

Please note that this is an automated report, which you are receiving as you have opted in to receive automatic reporting on your activity.

As your Account Manager, I would be happy to discuss your results with you at any time - please don't hesitate to contact me on 1800 546563 or at <%=From.EmailAddress %> should you have any questions.

VerticalContentItem.Subject: LinkMe usage report for <%= orgName %> for <%= reportPeriod %>

ViewContentItem.ViewPartContentItem:
Hi <%= toName %>

As you may or may not be aware, I am your dedicated LinkMe Account Manager, and I am responsible for your organisation's current account with LinkMe.

As part of LinkMe's service to you, our regular reporting has indicated that your organisation has not performed any searches in the past month. This is just a courtesy email to remind you of how LinkMe can help you save time and money in sourcing quality candidates.

If you are unfamiliar with LinkMe (or just to refresh your memory):

  • LinkMe is a candidate resume database with professional networking capability
  • We currently have <%= memberCount %> members - a large pool of potential candidates at your fingertips!
  • We are growing by over <%= weeklyMemberGrowth %> members per week
  • Part of your current subscription includes unlimited job-posts to our job-board

This is not a marketing email - you currently have a subscription to access our database, and so unless you no longer require access to quality candidates to fill vacant your roles, it would be a waste not to utilise our database as part of your existing account!

If you would like further information, or would like a refresher training session to demonstrate some of the exciting new upgrades that have happened on the LinkMe site since your initial subscription, please feel free to contact me either via return email or on the contact details below.

I look forward to your response.

VerticalContentItem.Subject: LinkMe Candidate Care Program: Joins for <%= orgName %> for <%= reportPeriod %>

ViewContentItem.ViewPartContentItem:
Hi <%= toName %>

Thank you for your participation in our Candidate Care Program. The program is a great opportunity for you to provide your Candidates with an alternative job hunting option as well as be remunerated for your efforts.

For last month, your organisation generated <%= referralCount %> candidate joins. Please note that payments are made quarterly once your accumulated reward total reaches $20 or over.

Thanks once again,

VerticalContentItem.Subject: A notice from LinkMe: You have no remaining 'candidate contact credits'

ViewContentItem.ViewPartContentItem:
Hi <%=To.FirstName%>

Thank you for using LinkMe for your candidate sourcing - our records show that you have no remaining contact credits in your account.

To purchase more candidate contact credits for continued access to LinkMe's resume database candidates, ">click here. All data associated with your account, such as folders and saved searches, will remain available to you. Once logged in, you can use our secure credit card transaction process to purchase more credits.

Did you know that LinkMe offers subscriptions for unlimited access to the resume database for larger volume users? Call us on 1800 546 563 to find out how an annual subscription to LinkMe may be more cost effective for your organisation.

We look forward to seeing you on our site again soon.

VerticalContentItem.Subject: A reminder from LinkMe: Your remaining 'candidate contact credits' are running low

ViewContentItem.ViewPartContentItem:
Hi <%=To.FirstName%>

Thank you for using LinkMe for your candidate sourcing - our records show that you have <%= Quantity %> credits left in your account.

This is just a reminder to plan your next purchase of candidate contact credits for continued access to LinkMe's resume database candidates. To purchase more credits, ">click here to login and use our secure credit card transaction process.

Did you know that LinkMe offers subscriptions for unlimited access to the resume database for larger volume users? Call us on 1800 546 563 to find out how an annual subscription to LinkMe may be more cost effective for your organisation.

We look forward to seeing you on our site again soon.

VerticalContentItem.Subject: A reminder from LinkMe: Your remaining 'job applicant credits' are running low

ViewContentItem.ViewPartContentItem:
Hi <%=To.FirstName%>

Thank you for using LinkMe for your job advertising – our records show that you have <%= Quantity %> applicant credits left in your account.

This is just a reminder to plan your next purchase of job applicant credits for continued access to LinkMe's job board. To purchase more credits, ">click here to login and use our secure credit card transaction process. Please note: if you do not top up your credits and your account runs out, your job advertisement will be no longer be published on the LinkMe job board.

For more information please feel free to contact us on 1800 546 563.

We look forward to seeing you on our site again soon.

VerticalContentItem.Subject: A notice from LinkMe: You have no remaining 'job applicant credits'

ViewContentItem.ViewPartContentItem:
Hi <%=To.FirstName%>

Thank you for using LinkMe for your job advertising – our records show that you have no applicant credits left in your account.

As you currently have no applicant credits remaining, your active job advertisements have been closed and you will no longer receive applicants. If you would like to receive further applicants for your job advertisements, please ">click here to purchase more credits. Once you have purchased more credits, you can re-publish your advertisements by accessing them in the 'closed ads' section of the logged in environment.

Alternatively, and in addition, you can publish new advertisements to the LinkMe job board via the 'Post new ad' area of the logged in environment.

We look forward to seeing you on our site again soon.

VerticalContentItem.Subject: A reminder from LinkMe: Your remaining 'job ad credits' are running low

ViewContentItem.ViewPartContentItem:
Hi <%=To.FirstName%>

Thank you for using LinkMe for your job advertising – our records show that you have <%= Quantity %> job ad credits left in your account.

This is a reminder that you may wish to plan to purchase further credits in order to ensure continued access to post jobs on the LinkMe job board and network.

We look forward to seeing you on our site again soon.

VerticalContentItem.Subject: A notice from LinkMe: You have no remaining 'job ad credits'

ViewContentItem.ViewPartContentItem:
Hi <%=To.FirstName%>

Thank you for using LinkMe for your job advertising – our records show that you have no job ad credits left in your account.

This is a reminder that you may wish to plan to purchase further credits in order to continue to post jobs on the LinkMe job board and network.

Please note that you still have access to your current live ads and applicants, and you will continue to receive applicants for current live job ads.

To discuss job ad purchase options, please contact me on 1800 LINK ME at your earliest convenience.

We look forward to seeing you on our site again soon.

VerticalContentItem.Subject: Receipt for Order # <%= Order.ConfirmationCode %>

ViewContentItem.ViewPartContentItem:
LinkMe Pty Ltd
PO Box 408
Neutral Bay NSW 2089
ABN: 95 111 132 953

Receipt

Recipient: <%= To.FullName %>
<% for (int index = 0; index < Order.Items.Count; ++index) { LinkMe.Domain.Roles.Orders.OrderItem item = Order.Items[index]; %> <% } %> <% for (int index = 0; index < Order.Adjustments.Count; ++index) { LinkMe.Domain.Roles.Orders.OrderAdjustment adjustment = Order.Adjustments[index]; LinkMe.Domain.Roles.Orders.TaxAdjustment taxAdjustment = adjustment as LinkMe.Domain.Roles.Orders.TaxAdjustment; LinkMe.Domain.Roles.Orders.SurchargeAdjustment surchargeAdjustment = adjustment as LinkMe.Domain.Roles.Orders.SurchargeAdjustment; LinkMe.Domain.Roles.Orders.BundleAdjustment bundleAdjustment = adjustment as LinkMe.Domain.Roles.Orders.BundleAdjustment; LinkMe.Domain.Roles.Orders.CouponAdjustment couponAdjustment = adjustment as LinkMe.Domain.Roles.Orders.CouponAdjustment; LinkMe.Domain.Roles.Orders.DiscountAdjustment discountAdjustment = adjustment as LinkMe.Domain.Roles.Orders.DiscountAdjustment; %> <% if (taxAdjustment != null) { %> <% } else if (surchargeAdjustment != null) { %> <% } else if (bundleAdjustment != null) { %> <% } else if (couponAdjustment != null) { bool found = false; LinkMe.Domain.Roles.Orders.PercentageAdjustmentAmount percentageAmount = couponAdjustment.Amount as LinkMe.Domain.Roles.Orders.PercentageAdjustmentAmount; LinkMe.Domain.Roles.Orders.FixedAdjustmentAmount fixedAmount = couponAdjustment.Amount as LinkMe.Domain.Roles.Orders.FixedAdjustmentAmount; if (Order.Items.Count > 1) { if (couponAdjustment.ProductId != null) { foreach (LinkMe.Domain.Products.Product product in Products) { if (product.Id == couponAdjustment.ProductId.Value) { found = true; %> <% } } } } if (!found) { %> <% } %> <% } else if (discountAdjustment != null) { %> <% } %> <% } %>
Product Quantity Price
<%= Credits[index].Description %> <%= Adjustments[index].Quantity.Value %> <%= GetPrice(item.Price, item.Currency) %>
Total (excl. GST) <%= GetPrice(Order.Price, Order.Currency) %>
Add GSTAdd American Express surcharge (<%= surchargeAdjustment.Surcharge.ToString("P1")%>)Less <%= bundleAdjustment.Percentage.ToString("P0")%> bundle discountLess <%= percentageAmount != null ? percentageAmount.PercentageChange.ToString("P0") : "$" + ((int)fixedAmount.FixedChange).ToString() %> coupon discount (applied to <%= product.Description %> only)Less <%= percentageAmount != null ? percentageAmount.PercentageChange.ToString("P0") : "$" + ((int)fixedAmount.FixedChange).ToString() %> coupon discountLess VECCI Member discount (<%= discountAdjustment.Percentage.ToString("P0")%>)<%= GetPrice(adjustment.AdjustedPrice - adjustment.InitialPrice, Order.Currency) %>
Total amount payable (incl. GST) <%= GetPrice(Order.AdjustedPrice, Order.Currency) %>
